usage.cn: 只有无所畏惧、内心足够坚强的人， 才能够获胜——Isabel Allende
usage.eng: Only the fearless and determined heart will get the gold medal.

usage.cn: 命运决定谁会进入我们的生活，内心决定我们与谁并肩。
usage.eng: Destiny determines who comes into our lives but it's the heart that decides who stays inside.

usage.cn: 有些人成功，是因为他们命中注定要成功；但绝大部分人成功，是因为他们下定决心要成功！Graeme Clegg（格雷姆•克莱格）
usage.eng: Some people succeed because they are destined to, but most people succeed because they are determined to!
